name: BUFF
description:
THIS IS BUFF

The weirdest game I've ever made. 

How it came to be:

Buff started out as a challenge by my friends: make a game in under an hour. So I did, I threw together a few sprites and coded a simple game. I could have stopped there, but for some reason I didn't. I continued to make characters and took suggestions from friends. I improved the UI, made a character select screen, and now here we are at the final product. This game is too weird to exist and I apologize to anyone who decided to play it.

Controls:

Player one:

A - Scroll left through character select

S - Select character, attack in battle

D - Scroll right through character select

Player Two:

H - Scroll left through character select

J - Select character, attack in battle

K - Scroll right through character select

How to play:

Wait for the screen to say buff, when it does, hit your respective key. That's it.

Music Credits:

Character Select: Nine Lives - Unicorn Heads

Battle: Forget Me Not - Patrick Patrikios

(Songs obtained through the YouTube audio library)
